alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kankakee, northern Newton, southern Porter, southern Lake and Jasper Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wheatfield to near Roselawn to near Hopkins Park. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kankakee, Rensselaer, DeMotte, Momence, Wheatfield, Lake Village, Roselawn, Aroma Park, Hopkins Park, Shelby, Hanging Grove, Sun River Terrace, Schneider, Mount Ayr, Thayer, Sumava Resorts, Baileys Corner, Stoutsburg, Fair Oaks and Parr. Including the following interstates... I-57 near mile marker 309. Indiana I-65 between mile markers 215 and 238. This includes... US 41 Dragway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
